name: Arduino101 Scratch Extension with machine learning
tagline: A easy way to let kids know what is machine learning
body:
# 支持机器学习功能的Arduino 101 Scratch扩展
本扩展源码编译需要General Vision的[CurieNeurons free library](https://www.general-vision.com/download/curieneurons-free-library/)支持。

## 使用方法
### 烧写firmware
#### 下载已编译的[firmware及烧写工具](firmware_tools.zip)，
#### 解压
#### 如果未安装驱动，请先运行tools\driver_install.bat，安装arduino 101驱动
#### 运行upload.bat烧写firmware。

### 启动scratch并加载扩展
http://scratchx.org/?url=http://xmu-maker.github.io/scratch-arduino101-neurons-ext/arduino101-neurons-scratch-extension.js

## 贡献者
郑灵翔 (@lxzheng) 王荣鑫 (@rxhn)


# Arduino 101 Scratch Extension with machine learning
Please install the [CurieNeurons free library](https://www.general-vision.com/download/curieneurons-free-library/) of General Vision before compiling the firmware

## Usage
### Flash firmware
#### download the [firmware & tools](firmware_tools.zip).
#### decompress it.
#### Install the arduino 101 device driver by run tools\driver_install.bat
#### Flash the firmware by run upload.bat

## Authors and Contributors
Lingxiang Zheng(@lxzheng), Rongxing Wan（@rxhn）
